title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Clarified Copilot PR approval behavior: Initiator's approval doesn't count with branch protection rules, and n+1 approvals may be required for final pushes.
Standardized prerequisites across IDEs (VS, JetBrains, Eclipse, Xcode) for Copilot Chat:
Replaced redundant access instructions with shared includes
Updated terminology (e.g., "Sign in" instead of "Log in")
Simplified subscription prerequisite text to reference a central guide.
summary:
- Clarified Copilot PR approval behavior: Initiator's approval doesn't count with branch protection rules, and n+1 approvals may be required for final pushes.
- Standardized prerequisites across IDEs (VS, JetBrains, Eclipse, Xcode) for Copilot Chat:
- Replaced redundant access instructions with shared includes
- Updated terminology (e.g., "Sign in" instead of "Log in")
- Added missing prerequisites for Xcode
- Simplified subscription prerequisite text to reference a central guide.
generated_title: Clarify Copilot PR approval and standardize IDE prerequisites

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Clarified Copilot PR approval behavior: Initiator's approval doesn't count with branch protection rules, and n+1 approvals may be required for final pushes.
- Standardized prerequisites across IDEs (VS, JetBrains, Eclipse, Xcode) for Copilot Chat:
  - Replaced redundant access instructions with shared includes
  - Updated terminology (e.g., "Sign in" instead of "Log in")
  - Added missing prerequisites for Xcode
- Simplified subscription prerequisite text to reference a central guide.

### Title
Clarify Copilot PR approval and standardize IDE prerequisites
